<html><DIV>I have downloaded the JFCUnit and tried some methods.  I have successfully tested the existing of my components, such as labels, buttons.  Next I would like to test the actions of those buttons.  Could anybody give me some hint or some sample codes on how to use enterClickAndLeave() methods?  Thanks!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
